name: Aliens Don't Exist
description: The road of adventure sometimes leads to a dead end. Help the courageous space explorer to survive all the attacks of fate and get out of the deadly labyrinth of an unexplored world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 450 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
